questions.question: Choose the correct sentence using a mixed conditional:
options: If I had studied harder, I would pass the exam tomorrow.
If I studied harder, I would have passed the exam yesterday.
If I had studied harder, I would have passed the exam.
If I study harder, I will pass the exam.
questions.answer: If I had studied harder, I would pass the exam tomorrow.

questions.question: Complete the following mixed conditional sentence: 'If she hadn't missed the train yesterday, she _____ here now.'
Which of the following sentences is an example of a mixed conditional?
options: If it rains, we will stay home.
If I had known, I would have told you.
If he were taller, he could reach the shelf.
If she had saved money last year, she could buy a car now.
questions.answer: If she had saved money last year, she could buy a car now.
